page.title: 17Walking, Riding in Strelley
page.content: "I used to live on Helston Drive, Strelley Estate. Now I am married I live in Bramcote but I still like walking through the village of Strelley. We walk from where we live, down Bilborough Road and up Sandy Lane to get through into the village. Sometimes we go into Cossall and Awsworth. We go over the first M1 bridge, walk all the way round Cossall and come back over the first motorway bridge again. It's a long walk. When I was little I had riding lessons. With living near Strelley I got to know a lot of people who stabled their horses there. One man from Bilborough kept five horses opposite the Broad Oak Inn He used to let me ride on one of them. So I soon found all the bridlepaths there are round Strelley. Sometimes I used to go out for a full day's riding and take a packed lunch with me."
